Get Pre-game Win Probability Data from API

cfb_metrics_wp_pregame.Rd

Get Pre-game Win Probability Data from API

cfb_metrics_wp_pregame(
  year = NULL,
  week = NULL,
  team = NULL,
  season_type = "regular"
)

Arguments

year

(Integer optional): Year, 4 digit format (YYYY)
week

(Integer optional): Week - values from 1-15, 1-14 for seasons pre-playoff, i.e. 2013 or earlier
team

(String optional): D-I Team
season_type

(String default regular): Select Season Type: regular or postseason

Value

A data frame with 9 variables:

season

integer.

season_type

character.

week

integer.

game_id

integer.

home_team

character.

away_team

character.

spread

integer.

home_win_prob

double.

away_win_prob

double.

Examples


cfb_metrics_wp_pregame(year = 2019, week=9, team='Texas A&M')

#> 2020-10-31 06:35:16: Scraping pre-game win probability data...
#>   season season_type week   game_id home_team         away_team spread
#> 1   2019     regular    9 401110835 Texas A&M Mississippi State    -11
#>   home_win_prob away_win_prob
#> 1         0.741         0.259
